conversations.body_text: Hi Dikiv4ik,    Sorry, your order has already been shipped, so we can't cancel it for you.

Ok, what about i receive it, and then ship it back to your warehouse or 
something like that?---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com

Hi Dikiv4ik,  Could you please take photos of your pedals from different angles showing the installation, as well as the wiring of the control box? In addition, please provide a video describing the issue and share it with us via Google Drive. We will help you identify the problem and resolve it as quickly as possible.

Hello!

I haven't received the package yet, so I can't provide a photo. I'm asking
for a return because I didn't have a strong cockpit that could provide
sufficient stability for the pedals. At first, I thought about making a 
homemade plate to mount the pedals, but after ordering, I realized that my
office chair wouldn't support the necessary load, and I wouldn't be able to
use it because of the angle (the minimum angle of the pedals is 80 degrees,
and I need 60).

So I'd like to send the package back immediately after receiving it and get
my money back.

Thank you for your understanding.


---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com

Hi Dikiv4ik,    Sure, you can return the item after receiving it. However, according to our return policy, if the item is returned without any defects, you will need to cover the shipping costs. Thank you for your understanding. You can either send the item back to our warehouse in Germany or we can arrange for our warehouse staff in Germany to pick it up from your location.

Hello,

I`d like to send it back to your warehouse in Germany so i will need an 
adвress or already prepared shipping label. And because I didn`t open the
package and assuming that it came with no defects how can i pay the shipping
cost?

---------- Původní e-mail ----------
Od: service@simsonn.com
